testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links, navigation)
Check for proper navigation structure with multiple pages
Verify application has real features like product catalog, authentication, etc.
Confirm page content is not just 'Vite + React' placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional features including product catalog, navigation menu, authentication options, and professional design
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or lacks interactive features, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Landing Page Content
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays proper content and call-to-actions
steps: Verify hero section with value proposition
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays complete content with hero, categories, featured products, and proper branding
testCases.failureCondition: Missing key sections or placeholder content

testCases.name: Product Catalog Functionality
testCases.description: Verify product catalog displays products with search and filtering
steps: Verify products are displayed in grid layout
Verify product cards show name, price, image, and supplier
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product catalog displays products with functional search and filters, shows product details on cards
testCases.failureCondition: No products displayed, search/filters not working, or missing product information

testCases.name: Product Detail Page
testCases.description: Verify product detail page displays complete product information
steps: Navigate to a product detail page
Check product name, description, and specifications
Verify price and unit of measure
Verify 'Add to Cart' or 'Login to Purchase' button
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product detail page shows complete information with images, pricing, specs, stock status, and supplier details
testCases.failureCondition: Missing critical information or broken UI elements

testCases.name: Customer Registration Flow
testCases.description: Test customer registration process end-to-end
steps: Fill out registration form with valid data
Verify success message or redirect to login/onboarding
Attempt to login with new credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer can successfully register and receives confirmation, can then login with credentials
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails, error messages not clear, or cannot login after registration

testCases.name: Supplier Registration Flow
testCases.description: Test supplier registration and application process
steps: Fill out supplier registration form with business details
Verify confirmation message about pending review
Check that application status is communicated
testCases.expectedOutcome: Supplier can submit application successfully and receives clear message about review process
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails or unclear messaging about next steps

testCases.name: User Login Flow
testCases.description: Test login functionality for different user roles
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can login successfully and are redirected to appropriate dashboards based on role
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails, incorrect redirects, or session not maintained

testCases.name: Customer Dashboard Content
testCases.description: Verify customer dashboard displays relevant information and actions
steps: Check quick actions (browse products, view cart, etc.)
Verify navigation to other customer features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays personalized content with orders, quick actions, and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard empty, missing sections, or not personalized

testCases.name: Shopping Cart Functionality
testCases.description: Test add to cart, cart management, and cart persistence
steps: Browse products and add item to cart
Add multiple items from different suppliers
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cart functions correctly with add/update/remove, shows accurate totals, persists across sessions
testCases.failureCondition: Cart operations fail, totals incorrect, or items don't persist

testCases.name: Checkout Process
testCases.description: Test complete checkout flow from cart to order confirmation
steps: Login as customer with items in cart
Check order appears in order history
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer can complete checkout successfully, receives order confirmation, and order appears in history
testCases.failureCondition: Checkout fails, payment processing errors, or order not created

testCases.name: Order Tracking and Timeline
testCases.description: Verify customers can track orders and view timeline
steps: Login as customer with existing order
Check ability to cancel order (if applicable)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order detail page shows complete information with timeline, delivery details, and actions
testCases.failureCondition: Order details incomplete, timeline not showing, or actions not working

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality
testCases.description: Test adding products to wishlist and managing wishlist
steps: Browse products and add to wishlist
testCases.expectedOutcome: Wishlist functions correctly with add/remove, move to cart, and alert preferences
testCases.failureCondition: Wishlist operations fail or alerts not configurable

testCases.name: Project Management Features
testCases.description: Test creating and managing projects for repeat orders
testCases.expectedOutcome: Projects can be created, products added, and loaded to cart successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Project operations fail or cart loading doesn't work

testCases.name: Review and Rating System
testCases.description: Test writing reviews and viewing reviews on products
steps: Login as customer with completed order
Navigate to order and write review
Fill out rating (1-5 stars) and review text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Reviews can be submitted and appear on product pages with ratings and supplier responses
testCases.failureCondition: Review submission fails or reviews not displayed properly

testCases.name: Supplier Dashboard Overview
testCases.description: Verify supplier dashboard shows business metrics and actions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Supplier dashboard displays comprehensive business metrics and quick access to management tools
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard missing metrics or broken navigation

testCases.name: Supplier Product Management
testCases.description: Test supplier's ability to add, edit, and manage products
steps: Fill out product form with details
testCases.expectedOutcome: Suppliers can add, edit, and manage products with full control over details and inventory
testCases.failureCondition: Product operations fail or inventory updates don't work

testCases.name: Inventory Management
testCases.description: Test inventory tracking and stock management
testCases.expectedOutcome: Suppliers can manage inventory with real-time updates, alerts, and audit logs
testCases.failureCondition: Inventory updates don't reflect or logs missing

testCases.name: Supplier Order Fulfillment
testCases.description: Test supplier's order management and fulfillment process
testCases.expectedOutcome: Suppliers can view and process orders with status updates and tracking information
testCases.failureCondition: Order status updates fail or notifications not sent

testCases.name: Delivery Management
testCases.description: Test delivery scheduling and tracking features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Suppliers can manage deliveries with scheduling, tracking, and proof of delivery
testCases.failureCondition: Delivery updates fail or proof upload doesn't work

testCases.name: Promotions and Pricing
testCases.description: Test creating and managing promotions and promo codes
steps: Set discount percentage or fixed amount
testCases.expectedOutcome: Suppliers can create promotions with codes, dates, and limits that apply correctly to products
testCases.failureCondition: Promotion creation fails or discounts not applied

testCases.name: Supplier Analytics Dashboard
testCases.description: Verify supplier can view business analytics and reports
testCases.expectedOutcome: Analytics dashboard shows comprehensive business metrics with charts, filters, and export options
testCases.failureCondition: Charts not rendering, data missing, or filters not working

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Overview
testCases.description: Verify admin dashboard displays platform-wide metrics
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin dashboard shows comprehensive platform metrics with alerts and quick actions
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard missing critical metrics or broken widgets

testCases.name: Admin User Management
testCases.description: Test admin's ability to manage users and accounts
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view, search, and manage user accounts with status updates and activity logs
testCases.failureCondition: User management operations fail or search doesn't work

testCases.name: Supplier Application Approval
testCases.description: Test admin's supplier application review process
steps: Verify supplier notified and can access supplier dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can review and approve/reject supplier applications with proper notifications
testCases.failureCondition: Approval process fails or notifications not sent

testCases.name: Admin Dispute Resolution
testCases.description: Test admin's ability to handle and resolve disputes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view, investigate, and resolve disputes with communication to all parties
testCases.failureCondition: Dispute resolution fails or communications not sent

testCases.name: Review and Product Moderation
testCases.description: Test admin's content moderation capabilities
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can moderate reviews and products, taking appropriate actions on flagged content
testCases.failureCondition: Moderation actions don't work or status updates fail

testCases.name: Platform Analytics
testCases.description: Verify platform-wide analytics and reporting
testCases.expectedOutcome: Analytics show comprehensive platform metrics with charts, trends, and export capabilities
testCases.failureCondition: Charts not rendering, data incomplete, or exports fail

testCases.name: Platform Settings Management
testCases.description: Test admin's ability to configure platform settings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can update platform settings that apply system-wide
testCases.failureCondition: Settings updates fail or don't apply correctly

testCases.name: Surplus Marketplace
testCases.description: Test peer-to-peer surplus marketplace features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customers can browse, make offers, and create surplus listings successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Listing creation fails or offer system doesn't work

testCases.name: Notification Center
testCases.description: Test notification system and preferences
steps: Click notification to view related content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notifications display correctly, can be marked as read, and preferences can be configured
testCases.failureCondition: Notifications don't appear or read status doesn't update

testCases.name: Chat and Messaging
testCases.description: Test real-time chat functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Chat works in real-time with message history and delivery confirmation
testCases.failureCondition: Messages don't send or real-time updates fail
testCases.note: Requires two users, difficult to fully automate

testCases.name: Address Management
testCases.description: Test managing multiple delivery addresses
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customers can add, edit, delete, and set default addresses
testCases.failureCondition: Address operations fail or default not applied in checkout

testCases.name: Payment Method Management
testCases.description: Test managing payment methods
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customers can add, update, and manage payment methods securely
testCases.failureCondition: Payment method operations fail or sensitive data exposed

testCases.name: Product Search
testCases.description: Test product search with various queries
steps: Enter search query in search bar
Verify 'no results' message for invalid search
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant results with proper filtering and handles edge cases
testCases.failureCondition: Search returns no results for valid queries or crashes on special characters

testCases.name: Product Filtering and Sorting
testCases.description: Test catalog filtering and sorting options
steps: Test sort by price (low to high)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Filters and sorting work correctly, update results in real-time, and can be combined
testCases.failureCondition: Filters don't apply or sorting doesn't work correctly

testCases.name: Responsive Design
testCases.description: Verify application works on different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation menu adapts (hamburger on mobile)
Verify forms are usable on mobile
Verify no horizontal scrolling on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully responsive and usable across all device sizes
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks on smaller screens or features not accessible on mobile

testCases.name: Error Handling and Messages
testCases.description: Test error handling and user feedback
steps: Submit form with missing required fields
Try to access protected route without login
Try to add out-of-stock item to cart
Check error messages have recovery actions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Errors are caught and displayed with clear, actionable messages
testCases.failureCondition: Application crashes on errors or error messages are unclear

testCases.name: Session Persistence
testCases.description: Test user session management and persistence
steps: Reopen browser and navigate to site
testCases.expectedOutcome: Sessions persist across browser sessions and cart data is maintained
testCases.failureCondition: Session lost on browser close or cart items disappear

testCases.name: Role-Based Access Control
testCases.description: Verify users can only access routes appropriate for their role
steps: Verify admin cannot place orders as customer
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can only access routes and features for their role, unauthorized access is blocked
testCases.failureCondition: Users can access routes outside their role or no redirect occurs

testCases.name: Input Validation
testCases.description: Test input validation on forms
steps: Test email field with invalid email
Test price fields with negative values
Test text fields with SQL injection attempts
Test text fields with XSS attempts
Test file uploads with invalid file types
testCases.expectedOutcome: All inputs are validated with appropriate error messages and malicious input is rejected
testCases.failureCondition: Invalid data accepted or validation messages unclear

testCases.name: Password Security
testCases.description: Test password security features
steps: Verify old password required for change
testCases.expectedOutcome: Password requirements enforced, reset process secure, and passwords properly protected
testCases.failureCondition: Weak passwords accepted or reset process insecure

testCases.name: Accessibility Compliance
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 Level AA)
testCases.failureCondition: Keyboard navigation broken or screen reader cannot read content
testCases.note: Manual testing with screen reader recommended

testCases.name: Page Load Performance
testCases.description: Test page load times and performance
steps: Measure product detail page load time
testCases.expectedOutcome: Pages load within acceptable times (< 3s for initial load), images optimized
testCases.failureCondition: Pages take more than 5 seconds to load or performance degrades over time

testCases.name: Email Notifications
testCases.description: Verify email notifications are sent correctly
steps: Register new user - check welcome email
Place order - check order confirmation email
Order status update - check notification email
Password reset - check reset link email
testCases.expectedOutcome: Email notifications sent for key events with proper formatting and working links
testCases.failureCondition: Emails not sent, improperly formatted, or links broken
testCases.note: Requires email testing service or manual verification

testCases.name: Backend API Integration
testCases.description: Test frontend-backend API integration
steps: Verify API calls are made correctly
Test error handling for API failures
Verify loading states shown during API calls
Verify data updates in UI after API success
testCases.expectedOutcome: Frontend correctly integrates with backend API with proper error handling and loading states
testCases.failureCondition: API calls fail, error handling missing, or UI doesn't update after successful calls
